trans-unit.source: Defines objects used to fill the interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: Define los objetos que se utilizan para rellenar formas de gráficos, por ejemplo rectángulos, elipses, gráficos circulares y rutas.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Esto es una clase base abstracta y no se pueden crear instancias.

trans-unit.source: To create a brush object, use classes derived from <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>, such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Para crear un objeto brush, utilice las clases derivadas de <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>, como <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>, y <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> class, you must override the <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Brush.Clone" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Al heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> (clase), es necesario reemplazar el <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Brush.Clone" /> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se reemplaza en una clase derivada, crea una copia exacta de este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> que este método crea.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos que usa <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos los recursos utilizados por este objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Al llamar a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> permite que los recursos utilizados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> objeto se reasignen para otros fines.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Llame a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> cuando haya terminado de usar <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> deja el <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> en un estado no utilizable.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Después de llamar a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A>, debe liberar todas las referencias a la <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> para que el recolector de elementos no utilizados pueda reclamar la memoria que el <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> estaba ocupando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: Realice siempre una llamada a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush.Dispose%2A> antes de liberar la última referencia al objeto <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: En caso contrario, los recursos que está usando no se liberarán hasta que el recolector de elementos no utilizados llame al método <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> del objeto `Finalize`.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Brush" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a este método público `Dispose()` método y <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` se invoca el protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método con el `disposing` parámetro establecido en `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` con `disposing` establecido en `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> references.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el `disposing` del parámetro es true, este método libera todos los recursos retenidos por los objetos administrados que este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> referencias.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca al método `Dispose()` de cada uno de los objetos a los que se hace referencia.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> puede recibir varias llamadas de otros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Al reemplazar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> tenga cuidado de no hacer referencia a objetos que se hayan eliminado en una llamada anterior a <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre cómo implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementa un método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información acerca de <see langword="Dispose" /> y <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpiar recursos no administrados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) y [reemplazar el método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que un objeto intente liberar recursos y realizar otras operaciones de limpieza antes de que sea reclamado por la recolección de elementos no utilizados.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: Puntero al objeto brush de [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, sets a reference to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: En una clase derivada, establece una referencia en un objeto Brush de [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
